transcript: I'm I'm better at leading the idea of the movement that we're trying to get behind and being able to like message that and communicate that well externally and to a degree internally and so I think it was really becoming the person who could cast that Vision which sounds really lame and I think that's where a lot of the work comes in is like what do I believe to be true and what do I want to make true in the world and so I think that's what we tried to build with this company compared to some of the other companies that we built in the past which you know transparently the first companies we have the mission was like don't be broke so
